sources.title: Bluebirds' Baby (1938)
sources.description: A flock of little bluebirds come to the rescue of an abandoned baby. They form a carrying-squadron and transport the babe to Happyland. But all their efforts to entertain and make the child happy are fruitless. Finally they locate the distraught mother and bring mother and child back together. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/bluebirds-baby-1938/

sources.title: Bluebirds' Baby (1938)
sources.description: The Sad Little Guinea Pigs is a 1938 cartoon short directed by Manny Gould and Ben Harrison. Watch on RetroFlix:

metadata.Plot: A flock of little bluebirds come to the rescue of an abandoned baby. They form a carrying-squadron and transport the babe to Happyland. But all their efforts to entertain and make the child happy are fruitless. Finally they locate the distraught mother and bring mother and child back together.
